title: Game â€“ Kiss Princess
author: Mana
content: kiss princess is 2 player hotseat game desktop. game is funny shows is admirer who is princess your relationship :-).rules game starts player 1 is given admirer role (without crown) tries kiss princess (player 2), player 2 is princess runs admirer. 30s roles are changed player 1 is princess player 2 is admirer. points kissing princess. longer kiss, more points! :-)watch for bugs, -10 points beaten.need 50 points win.
